name: fusty
content:
fusty adjective
(SMELL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not fresh and smelling unpleasant especially because of being left slightly wet: This room smells slightly fusty - I think I'll open a window.

fusty adjective
(OLD-FASHIONED)
old-fashioned in ideas and beliefs: Rupert's father belongs to some fusty old gentleman's club where they don't allow women in.
